text: Marie Anne "Marian" van der Meer (18 May 1936 â€“ 6 May 2022) was a Dutch politician. She was a member of the Labour Party. She was in the Provincial States of North Holland from 1970 to 1982, and in the Senate from 1983 to 1995. She was born in Hengelo, Netherlands. Meer died in Amsterdam on 6 May 2022 at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Dutch provincial politicians Category:Members of the Senate of the Netherlands Category:Labour Party (Netherlands) politicians Category:People from Hengelo Category:Politicians from Overijssel
title: Marian van der Meer
